titleStmt.title: A brief history of the times, &c. ...
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.
L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704. Observators.

notesStmt.note: The author's name appears on the t.p. of pt. III.
Parts 2-3 have imprint: London : Printed for R. Sare, 1688.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.

[pt. 1] A preface to the third volume of Observators -- pt. 2. Shewing the pretended Popish plot to have been quite another thing then it has been taken for -- pt. 3. Treating of the death of Sir E.B. Godfrey.
